nodes.text: Nallera's Mining Field was a region of space in the Tatoo system.

Stemming from the system's outermost reaches, Nallera's Mining Field remained one of Tatooine's oldest mining outposts. Nallera's Mining Field was far enough from the Hutts' influence, but close enough to Tatooine's space station to encourage trade and ship goods to the planet. The inhabitants of Nallera's Mining Field were friendly and welcomed travelers to their outpost.
Pilots of all factions could also find A'Lerris Verata near the Nalera's Mining Station for additional pilot work

Nallera's Mining Field appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
